sql.name: networkfaultpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: networkfault.left
networkfault.colTitle
sql.item: select trim('线路常规') from dual union all select trim('线路外力') from dual union all select trim('线路工程') from dual union all select trim('线路人为') from dual union all select trim('传输设备常规') from dual union all select trim('传输设备外力') from dual union all select trim('传输设备工程') from dual union all select trim('传输设备人为') from dual union all select trim('传输连接件常规') from dual union all select trim('传输连接件外力') from dual union all select trim('传输连接件工程') from dual union all select trim('传输连接件人为') from dual union all select trim('网管系统常规') from dual union all select trim('网管系统外力') from dual union all select trim('网管系统工程') from dual union all select trim('网管系统人为') from dual union all select trim('电源') from dual union all select trim('各项小计线路') from dual union all select trim('各项小计传输设备') from dual union all select trim('各项小计传输连接件') from dual union all select trim('各项小计网管系统') from dual union all select trim('各项小计电源') from dual union all select trim('各项小计合计') from dual

sql.name: networkfault.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('线路常规'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000005),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('线路外力'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000007),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('线路工程'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000009),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('线路人为'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000011),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('传输设备常规'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000017),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('传输设备外力'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000019),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('传输设备工程'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000021),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('传输设备人为'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000024),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('传输连接件常规'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000033),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('传输连接件外力'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000035),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('传输连接件工程'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000038),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('传输连接件人为'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000036),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('网管系统常规'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000042),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('网管系统外力'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000044),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('网管系统工程'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000046),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('网管系统人为'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000048),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('电源'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c536870933),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('各项小计线路'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000013),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('各项小计传输设备'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000015),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('各项小计传输连接件'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000026),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('各项小计网管系统'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000040),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('各项小计电源'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c536870933),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('各项小计合计'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl((sum(t.c802000013)+sum(t.c802000015)+sum(t.c802000026)+sum(t.c802000040)+sum(t.c536870933)),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
